sources.title: John Wayne - Cold Vengeance 1935 - Revenge rides at first light - directed by Robert N. Bradbury
sources.description:
John Mason helplessly witnesses the murder of his father and sets out in pursuit of the killer. Along the way, he falls under the spell of Alice, who distracts him from his goalâ€”until the day she introduces him to her brother, Rudd, whom John suspects to be his fatherâ€™s murderer.

Original Title: The Dawn Rider (1935)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/XyT9YIUru4k

Director: Robert N. Bradbury 
Writer: Lloyd Nosler
Starring: John Wayne, Marion Burns, Dennis Moore, Reed Howes, Joseph De Grasse
Release date: August 15, 1935 (USA)
Filming location: Corriganville, California, USA

metadata.Plot: In London, a young man fancies himself Jean Paul Belmondo. His flat is decorated with movie posters, he mutters in French, smokes cigarettes, dresses as if he's in '60's Paris. His mother calls - to her he's Trevor - and reminds him to pick up his younger sister, Minne. He meets up with her; she's accompanied by Tim, a friend. Trevor takes them to a French film. On the way out, he overhears a couple talking. She likes the film, her date doesn't. In character, Trevor punches out the guy. The young woman runs off and Trevor chases her. Has Trevor as Belmondo already pictured this scene?
metadata.Actors: Kris Marshall, Camilla Rutherford, Laura Lumley
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award4 wins & 1 nomination total
